comments: He fits in more as a student than a professor. He brings himself to the level of the students and uses relatable examples to get his point across. He loves to laugh, and teaches through jokes. He prints out things to bring to class, and has extras in case you miss. He will make sure he answers your questions, and he will never let you down.

comments: Jacobs is such a gem. He is hilarious and I always feel like I understand the material. He gives 110% to his students, prints out notes and classwork with quirky examples. He seriously loves statistics and is an incredible professor. I highly recommend his class.

comments: Jason Jacob has unique methods that make you see math in a whole new way. Very inspirational and sometimes the way he explains concepts will blow your mind. If you struggle with math, be sure that you get this professor as he is so knowledgeable and caring for his students.

comments: Professor Jacobs is by far one of my favorite teachers at ERAU. He is always willing to answer questions, is hilarious, and loves telling stories in class. He is a decent grader, and there are not many tests. As long as you attend class and keep up to date on the MyMathLab assignments, you will pass the class.

comments: The best Math professor I have ever had. Having taken Calc 1, 2, and 3, he still beats out every teacherprofessor I have ever had for a math class. He will stay late to help you, and show up early if you need more help or time on a test. His classes are incredibly fair, and he\'s an extremely nice guy. Highly recommended. He\'s hilarious and smart.

TAKE HIS CLASS!
